dct_title_s: Map of Illinois & Missouri~~exhibiting the post offices, post roads, canals, rail roads &c.

dct_description_sm: Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington.  "David H. Burr (Late topographer to the Post Office)".  At lower right-hand corner: John Arrowsmith. Dimensions: 128 x 99 centimeters

dcat_keyword_sm: Railroads Illinois Early Works to 1850 Maps
